message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product.  Given its potential, I believe a starting price of $1,500,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value.  However, this product has unique features that make it stand out. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,350,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000, but no more. Can you consider this offer?
